question:
You and some friends ate a meal at a restaurant to celebrate a special occasions, and you were very pleased with the food and service.
Write a letter to the restaurant manager. In your letter
-give details of your visit to the restaurant
-explain the reason for the celebration
-say what was good about the food and the service
text: I am writing to you to praise your effort to arrange the best party ever in your hotel last Friday, which was arranged according to the schedule.

We had booked your hotel almost a month ago on the web when we asked for particular facilities to arrange  the birthday of a friend on the 25th of August. According to our requirements,  we had found that the hotel was clean, quiet, and nicely decorated with flowers for the party. In addition, a cake was also arranged by your staff.

About the party, the program was arranged to enjoy one of my friends’ birthday, who is an orphan, but he is well-known in society for his personal qualities ; therefore, it was vital for all of us to ensure a proper party for him.

To our surprise, the meal and the service quality were excellent as well as health and hygiene, which were appreciated by most of our members. The Biryani was hot and curry was prepared from fresh vegetables, which was preferred by all.
We are planning for another party next month and asking for a quotation from you. I am awaiting your response.
